Text: I was expecting worse, she did almost get kicked a few times though.

It's not sick at all. The horse got no complaints. She's having a toss, too. That's called getting along with all nature's creatures. More people ought to try it and there'll be less stress related violence and illness in the world, I reckon.
as popeye would say 'I can stands no more"
Well, if you picture Popeye getting a shot of horsey jism in his eye, 'splotz!' then his 'can't stand it' remark makes a crapload of sense.
